sub_title: DecisionQraft Founder | Empowering Organisations with Decision Skills
summary:
Clarity and the transparency, so that you can make your decisions with confidence and commitment. This is what I bring, as the founder and director of DecisionQraft.

Making decisions under uncertainty has always been at the core of my work. Decision making is a skill that can be taught. Good quality decision making involves both the science of data analysis, and the art of human interaction. It is a craft, a vital craft for navigating our complex and unpredictable world.

I have nearly 30 years of global experience as a Petroleum Engineer and Decision Professional. Throughout my career, I have worked on diverse projects in technical and commercial leadership roles, across execution, joint ventures, governance, and auditing. My experience spans multiple countries and cultures, providing me with a unique perspective on decision making.

I love to share my knowledge and expertise with others, through coaching, training, and facilitating. I add real value by helping teams and individuals manage risk and uncertainty, frame opportunities, and engage stakeholders. Through these interventions teams, departments, and organisations ultimately craft their quality decisions. My ability to work across hierarchies, foster collaboration, identify pain points, and motivate people sets me apart.

I enjoy what I do and enjoy doing it well. With DecisionQraft, that is what I do.
•	Decision Analysis and Decision Quality
•	Risk and Uncertainty Management (incl. Value of Information)
•	Facilitation (incl. Opportunity Framing, Stakeholder Management)
•	Technical Assurance (incl. Value Assurance, Petroleum Engineering)
